title: Missing details about constraint violations with GraphQL after a reload in dev mode
body:
### Describe the bug

At first start in dev mode, if I execute an operation with values that fail bean validation, I get a proper error response with details about the constraint violation. But after a reload and executing the same operation, I get only a generic

```
{
  "errors": [
    {
      "message": "System error",
      "locations": [
        {
          "line": 2,
          "column": 3
        }
      ],
      "path": [
        "rate"
      ],
      "extensions": {
        "classification": "DataFetchingException",
        "code": "constraint-violation",
        "exception": "javax.validation.ConstraintViolationException"
      }
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "rate": null
  }
}
```
